extensions.name: ScriptsShortcuts
extensions.description: This script allows users to add shortcuts to the scripts they have installed
extensions.author: Mathieu Chaptel

extensions.name: ConnectAllSelNodes
extensions.description:
This script lets users connect all selected nodes to the composite of their choice.

To launch this script, no need to select the composite in the node view, it will be chosen with a prompt. Add the "MC_ConnectButton" function to your scripting toolbar to use.

Keeping "Alt" down while clicking the button will disconnect the nodes.

Set shortcuts to the connect/Disconnect functions with the extension ScriptShortcuts for easier use.
extensions.author: Mathieu C

extensions.name: Keyframe Jumper
extensions.description:
This script contains two functions : PreviousDrawing and NextDrawing.

Set them to shortcuts with the extension ScriptShortcuts to be able to flip through drawing exposures, even if the number of the drawing is the same in the XSheet (unlike with the normal shortcuts!)

In the future, this extension will also use one same buttons to go from keyframe to keyframe on peg layers depending on the selection. Stay tuned!
extensions.author: Mathieu C

extensions.name: Create Colored Backdrops
extensions.description:
Simple Script to create a backdrop of any color possible.

This script uses the scripting library openHarmony and will not work if it's not installed. Install it from the store for this to work.

Use the extension ScriptShortcuts to set a shortcut to this function or add it to your scripting toolbar.

v1.0.1 : can now create backdrops inside any group.
extensions.author: Mathieu C

extensions.name: link Nodes
extensions.description:
Simple script to set to a shortcut and easily connect to selected nodes with a single keystroke. No more dragging the line across multiple screens!

The node that's the highest will be connected into the node that's further down.
Keep the "Shift" key down to reverse the order.

Use the extension ScriptShortcuts to easily set a shortcut to this function or add it to your scripting toolbar.
extensions.author: Mathieu C

extensions.name: Link Palette To Selected Nodes
extensions.description:
This script links the selected palette to all selected nodes.
If shift is pressed and the selected palette is an element palette, it will be unlinked from all elements.

This script uses the scripting library openHarmony and will not work if it's not installed. Install it from the store for this to work.

Use the extension ScriptShortcuts to set a shortcut to this function or add it to your scripting toolbar.

v1.0.1: Doesn't connect empty palette if no scene palette present. Requires openHarmony 0.2.8
